headline.main: M'ARTHUR TELLS C.I.O. OF FAITH IN LABOR; Replies to Pledges of Help From Two U.S. Federations

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, April 1 (U.P.) -- General Douglas MacArthur said today that American labor would be the "indestructible backbone" that would determine the outcome of the war, and expressed a firm conviction that workers at home would make a mighty effort to keep their soldiers at the front supplied.
abstract: Gen MacArthur replies to loyalty pledge
